title: #13 Measure your Calibre
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large \lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sqrt{\cos x} - \sqrt[3]{\cos x}}{\sin^2x} = \frac{A}{B}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The limit above holds true for coprime integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is negative and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is positive. Find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A+B"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":""}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"     "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Bonus","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":": Evaluate this limit without applying "},{"type":"text","text":"L'Hôpital's rule","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Other problems: Check your Calibre"}]}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Using the property of limits"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \lim_{x \to a} \left[ f(x) \cdot g(x) \right] = \lim_{x \to a} f(x) \cdot \lim_{x \to a} g(x)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We can simplify "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} \displaystyle \lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{ {(\cos x)}^{1/2} - {(\cos x)}^{1/3} }{ 1 - \cos^2 x } &= \lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{ {(\cos x)}^{1/2} - {(\cos x)}^{1/3} }{ (1+\cos x) (1-\cos x) } \\
&= \left( \lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{1}{1+\cos x} \right) \cdot \left( \lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{ {(\cos x)}^{1/2} - {(\cos x)}^{1/3} }{ 1 - \cos x } \right) \\
&= \dfrac 12 \cdot \lim_{x \to 0} \dfrac{ {(\cos x)}^{1/2} - {(\cos x)}^{1/3} }{ 1 - \cos x } \end{aligned} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            I think that should be 2x, But Didnt it affected the answer? I guess it was a Typo while he was coding.

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}
